sentence: ? NC-11: State Sen. Chuck Edwards' opening spot for the May Republican primary focuses on his business background, conservative record, and "mountain values," which is a not-so-subtle swipe at Rep. Madison Cawthorn's failed attempt to district hop.
title: Morning Digest: Oregon's new congressional district brings some old characters out of the woodwork

author: David Weigel
title: The Trailer: The pandemic planner, the crypto billionaire and a bunch of angry Democrats

sentence: Jeff Singer: Cawthorn's main opponent right now looks like state Senator Chuck Edwards, who has the endorsement of Senator Thom Tillis.
title: The Downballot: Big, big May primary preview (transcript)
